title: Gordon Ramsay fans thirsty after chef shows off 6-pack in throwback
text:
Gordon is teasing his fans with this image (Picture: Rex Features)

Seems Gordon Ramsay has found himself a new fanbase, after sharing a shirtless picture of himself over the weekend.

Right now a lot of fans need to take a cold shower, after the TV chef thought a picture of his abs on a beach was the best thing to post on a Saturday.

The 52-year-old showed us all how he’s been working on his fitness as he shared his best wishes for his followers taking part in the Ironman triathlon.

Considered one of the most difficult sporting events in the world, Gordon himself took part, which is perhaps why he wanted to show everyone his post-iron man bod.

We’d do the same if we had a six-pack, too.

People are loving it (Picture: INSTAGRAM / @gordongram)

‘Wishing all the athletes the very best of luck for #kona @ironmantri today , crossing the line for me was one of the most exciting feeling ever !’ he wrote.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It was the comments that soon flowed in that showed us the nation is thirsty for Gordon, as some followers resorted to calling the chef ‘daddy’. Just don’t. Aside from the mentions of daddy was a lot of ‘ripped’ comparisons. And some great food puns.

One applauded his fitness, as a fan wrote: ‘Looking shredded mate.’

Another joker chimed in: ‘When u realize the chef is the REAL meal.’

Want another? One follower was loving the cooking puns as they replied: ‘Gordon out here looking more shredded than the meat he slices.’

It comes after the celebrity chef admitted he fainted during the recent birth of son Oscar.

He welcomed another kid (Picture: @gordongram)

The Kitchen Nightmares star appeared on The Jonathan Ross Show and revealed that wife Tana wouldn’t allow him to be in the room at the births of his four other children, but this time she made an exception.

‘Tana didn’t want to see me there for previous births,’ he told Wossy. ‘She said, “I don’t want you to see me in this state so get out.” This time I was there and I absolutely crapped my pants.’

The chef confessed the experience was just too much for him and he collapsed upon watching his wife give birth.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I fainted,’ he continued. ‘I literally dropped on the floor. I was sat there and Oscar popped out through the sunroof and then they sort of throw you on him and he’s screaming and I fell back, the nurse grabbed me.’

We hazard a guess a fair few fans have been hitting the floor due to lack of oxygen as they try to catch their breath looking at this throwback…
